title: i already have riot kyle and just got my mystery gift today, after i open the box nothing shows HELP
body: like the title, i got the riot kyle already and got the icon days ago, when i log in today, i got the mystery box, but after i open is, nothing shows, i don't know what i get, where to check? Or i didn't get anything?

replies.body: I think you can check in recently purchased, although I'm not sure. I know it's not a purchase, but I think it shows up there anyway.
i checked as u said, it is not there but still thank you for the help

It seems there were some ghost notifications that went out to some players (including myself) that weren't for anything. You'll get another notification when your mystery gift gets added to your account.

Let me know if you don't have anything by tomorrow, the 23rd.
i still didn't get it yesterday and i just checked still didn't show up....is that happened for other people? i thought i am the unlucky one...

It looks like due to some snags along the way, we're still distributing content out. The new deadline is the 30th of this month.

Let me know if you have any questions.
